imdb.plot outline: A documentary series about the battles of the Scanian war fought by Sweden in Germany and southern Sweden 1674-1679. Per Dahlberg interviews historical experts and go visit the sites of the battle fields, where re-enactments of parts of the battles and firing experiments are carried out.
imdb.title: Svenska slag
plot: A documentary series about the battles of the Scanian war fought by Sweden in Germany and southern Sweden 1674-1679. Per Dahlberg interviews historical experts and go visit the sites of the battle fields, where re-enactments of parts of the battles and firing experiments are carried out.::Anders E Lundin
